dcterms:description: The MART dataset comprises 500 art pieces by professional artists and 10 thousand ratings by 100 people, providing positive emotion scores on a 7-point Likert scale.
dcterms:title: MART dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Vig
S. Sen
J. Riedl
dcterms:description: The Movielens Tag Genome dataset encodes community knowledge to support novel interaction, containing 3952 movies, 6040 users, and 1 million ratings, with each movie described by 1128 tags.
dcterms:title: Movielens Tag Genome dataset

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset comprising groups of users with different 'ideal' items that are removed prior to model training, used for evaluating the proposed methods.
dcterms:title: Synthetic dataset
